snippet: The automaker will fix driver’s side air bags in about 2,000 Corvettes because they could separate from their steering wheels.
abstract: General Motors tells auto dealers to halt sales of certain 2015 Chevrolet Corvettes due to possible faulty air bags and parking brake cables.
lead_paragraph: The automaker will fix driver’s side air bags in about 2,000 Corvettes because they could separate from their steering wheels.

headline.main: G.M. Stops Some Corvette Sales Over Air Bags
headline.print_headline: G.M. Stops Some Corvette Sales Over Air Bags
